entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this morning. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Monday 27 March 2023
